summary: Completed retest of GymLog MVP focusing on Cloud Backup, Form Reset, and Modal functionality. Cloud Backup now working correctly with integer IDs - main issue RESOLVED. Form reset and navigation issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Form fields not reset after successful workout logging - values remain in inputs
Clicking Exercises tab does not navigate to Exercises page - remains on Log Workout page

integration_issues.issue: Cannot test modal functionality due to navigation bug - Exercises page not accessible

passed_tests: Backend backup with integer IDs - 200 OK (FIXED)
Frontend loads correctly with Log Workout page
Cloud Backup functionality - Success toast appears
Cloud Backup timestamp updates correctly (Last Synced: 11/25/2025, 4:37:42 PM)
Exercise selection from popover dropdown works
Workout logging saves successfully with 'Workout logged!' toast
Navigation tabs are visible and clickable
Settings page loads and displays user ID
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. CRITICAL SUCCESS: Cloud Backup 422 error is FIXED - integer IDs now working correctly. 2. Fix form reset issue in LogWorkout.jsx - form fields should clear after successful save. 3. Fix navigation bug - Exercises tab click not switching to Exercises page. 4. Once navigation is fixed, retest Exercise modal functionality.
